maqras.text: Your Lord knows that you rise a little less than two thirds of the night, and half of it, and one third of it; and a group of those who are with you. And God measures the night and the day. He knows that you will not be able to keep-up, so He pardons you. So read what is made easy of the Qur'an. He knows that there will be sick among you, and others that go forth in the land seeking from the bounty of God, and others who are fighting in the cause of God, so read what you can of it. And hold the contact prayer and contribute towards purification and lend God a loan of righteousness. And whatever you put forth yourselves, you will find it with God, for it is better and a greater reward. And seek the forgiveness of God, for God is Forgiving, Merciful
O you who are cloaked
Stand and warn
And your Lord magnify
And purify your garments
And abandon that which afflicts
And do not give for a return
And to your Lord be patient
So when the horn is sounded
That will be a very difficult Day
Upon the rejecters it will not be easy
So leave Me alone with he whom I have created
And I gave him abundant wealth
And sons to bear witness
And I made everything comfortable for him
Then he is greedy, wanting that I give more
No. He was stubborn to Our revelations
I will exhaust him in ascending
He thought and he analyzed
So woe to him for how he thought
Then woe to him for how he thought
Then he looked
Then he frowned and became bad tempered
Then he turned away and was arrogant
So he said: "This is nothing except the magic of old
This is nothing except the saying of a human being
I will cast him in the scorching heat
And do you know what is the scorching heat
It does not spare nor leave anything
A signal to human beings
Upon it is nineteen

And We have made the guardians of the Fire to be angels; and We did not make their number except as a test for those who have rejected, so that those who were given the Book would understand, and those who have faith would be increased in faith, and so that those who have been given the Book and the believers do not have doubt, and so that those who have a sickness in their hearts and the rejecters would say: "What did God mean with an example such as this?" It is such that God misguides whom He wishes, and He guides whom He wishes. And none know the soldiers of your Lord except He; and it is but a reminder for human beings
No, by the moon
And by the night when it withdraws
And by the morning when it brightens
It is one of the great ones
A warning to human beings
For any among you who wishes to advance or regress
Every soul is held by what it earned
Except for the people of the right
In gardens, they will inquire
About the criminals
What has caused you to be in the scorching heat
They said: "We were not as those who made the contact prayer
And we did not feed the poor person
And we used to participate with those who spoke falsehood
And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
Until the certainty came to us
So no intercession of intercessors could help them
Why did they turn away from being reminded
They are like fleeing zebras
Running from the lion
Alas, every one of them wants to be given separate scripts
No, they do not fear the Hereafter
No, it is a reminder
So whoever wishes will remember it
And none will remember except if God wills. He is the source of righteousness and the source of forgiveness
